jurisdictions.name: City of Minneapolis
jurisdictions.notes: MN SolarAPP+ permitting incentive eligible jurisdiction. Xcel Energy interconnection. PV arrays max 150 ft in any direction per MN building code. Snow loads 35-45 psf.

jurisdictions.name: City of St. Paul
jurisdictions.notes: Permit fee starts at $138 for systems 0-20 kW. Xcel Energy interconnection. Historic district review may apply.

jurisdictions.name: City of Rochester
jurisdictions.notes: Standard MN permitting. Rochester Public Utilities (RPU) municipal utility provides interconnection. SolarAPP+ incentive eligible.

jurisdictions.name: City of Duluth
jurisdictions.notes: SolSmart Gold designated community. Solar allowed by-right as accessory use in all major zones. Minnesota Power (ALLETE) interconnection. Northern MN snow loads 50-70 psf -- structural considerations critical.

jurisdictions.name: City of Bloomington
jurisdictions.notes: Solar permit checklist available online for residential and commercial PV systems. Xcel Energy interconnection. SolarAPP+ incentive eligible.

state_level_requirements.contractor_license_type: Licensed electrician required. Type A Master Electrician or Journeyman Electrician under master's supervision. Building contractor license for structural work.
state_level_requirements.net_metering_details: Net metering for systems up to 1 MW. Credits at retail rate for systems up to 40 kW residential. Monthly rollover, annual true-up. Xcel Energy (Northern States Power), Minnesota Power, and municipal utilities. Solar*Rewards production incentive from Xcel.
state_level_requirements.solar_access_details: Minn. Stat. 500.30 protects solar easements. HOAs cannot unreasonably restrict solar installations.
state_level_requirements.solarapp_details: Minnesota Department of Commerce administers $2M SolarAPP+ permitting incentive program. $1.5M for Xcel Energy territory, $500K outside. Incentives of $5,000-$20,000 per jurisdiction (capped at $10,000 base). Applications accepted since February 2025.
state_level_requirements.state_incentive_program: SolarAPP+ permitting incentives ($2M program); Xcel Solar*Rewards; Community Solar Gardens (one of largest programs nationally); property and sales tax exemptions; 1.5% solar energy standard within 25% RPS
